testcase.name: Validate Home Page Contents
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I am viewing the ‘Home’ page...........................................passed Then I am presented with a carousel displaying 3 featured articles..........passed And Clicking the ‘Next’ button on the carousel will load the next 3 featured articles.passed And Clicking the ‘Previous’ button on the carousel will load the previous 3 featured articles.passed

testcase.name: Validate Contact Us hamburger menu
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I select ‘Contact us’ from the hamburger menu Then I am taken to the ‘Contact us’ page.passed And I am presented with the below options for contacts......................passed

testcase.name: Validate Search Page
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I click on the ‘Magnifying glass’ icon to perform a search And I enter the text "Single page applications".passed And I submit the search.....................................................passed Then I am taken to the search results page..................................passed And I am presented with at least 1 search result............................passed
